Articles.Content: I downloaded KSRSS and everything is amazing love the mod except for the moon texture is broken from space its fine but when I get below 15km the moon just goes black I cant see the surface at all its just black I looked it up and cant find anything if anyone knows how to fix this please tell me.
I am unfamiliar with this mod, but I have moved your thread to the modding support subforum where someone else might be. Good luck.
